name: To The Throne
storyline:
The first time King Kingsley attempts to sit on the recently vacated True Throne he is booted off. He is not worthy! The Royal Emblem splits into 6 pieces and flies into the Tower Of Trials.

Guided by the Royal Advisor "Bitsworth", he must conquer the challenges that await him in the Tower, reassemble the Royal Emblem and earn his right to sit on the True Throne!
summary:
To The Throne is a GameBoy inspired puzzle game for iOS. Follow the trials of the young King Kingsley through the trials which will earn him the right to the True Throne!

Explore 6 unique areas and test your puzzling skills with easy to learn, hard to master block manipulation mechanics!

Enjoy the incredible "retro-medieval-chiptune" soundtrack written by Luke Thomas while puzzling away! Available on Spotify (https://open.spotify.com/album/00r823Z42wpHb5AuPhdVbp) and iTunes (https://itunes.apple.com/gb/album/to-throne-official-soundtrack/id1138037081) now!
